creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: winter scene: brown and blue building with stacked wood in center, surrounded by snow; snowy landscape in background with silhouettes of vegetation, low mountains in background
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Winter in Taguchi
